caption.title: Thermal responses of Ae. aegypti and DENV traits that drive transmission (data sources listed in Table B in S2 Text).
caption.p: Informative priors based on data from additional Aedes spp. and flavivirus studies helped to constrain uncertainty in the model fits (see Materials and Methods; Table C in S2 Text). Points and error bars indicate the data means and standard errors (for display only; models were fit from the raw data). Black solid lines are the mean model fits; red dashed lines are the 95% credible intervals. Thermal responses for Ae. albopictus are shown in Fig A in S1 Text.
